headline: BofA Lowers its Price Target on The Progressive Corporation (PGR) to $315 from $329 and Maintains a Buy Rating
summary: The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) is among the 11 High Growth Financial Stocks to Buy Now. On February 19, 2026, BofA lowered its price target on The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) to $315 from $329 and maintained a Buy rating. BofA said Progressive reported net investment income of $311M versus its $332M forecast, calling it “a mere” […]
